hooks.name: format-on-edit
hooks.description: Run prettier on edited TypeScript/JavaScript files

hooks.name: lint-check-on-edit
hooks.description: Check for lint errors after TypeScript/JavaScript edits

hooks.name: typecheck-on-edit
hooks.description: Run tsc on edited files to catch type errors
hooks.command: cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | grep -E 'error TS' | head -10 || true

hooks.name: pre-commit-quality-gate
hooks.description: Full quality check before git commits
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && npx tsc --noEmit && npx eslint .; fi
